column4: ok I have placed both a .php and a .html file under the /var/www/apache-default folder yet when browing to it I get "Not Found" ?
so I now have files there, but apache does not seem to be locating them
search doesnt find a httpd.conf file on the system ?
thats the output im gettig from filesystem search
u sure u installed it rite?
I simply did default installation of apache/mysql/php only thing I havent done is rebooted
try the ls and give the output
u gotta do some changes in the index
i hav a walkthrough for installing from source...want em?
